## üéØ **SPECIFIC INTEGRATION EXAMPLES**

### **Example 1: Legal Document Analysis dengan Full Integration**
```python
# User uploads legal document
document = "Undang-Undang Dasar 1945 Pasal 1..."

# Maya Legal analysis dengan enhanced symbols
analysis = maya_legal.analyze_with_alien_enhancement(document)
# Result: ‚üê Constitutional + ‚ßà Flow + ‚óà Critical Decision

# DNA encryption untuk security
encrypted_doc = dna_crypto.encode_legal_document(document)
# Result: "ATGCATGC..." genetic sequence

# Quantum complexity scoring
complexity = quantum_crypto.analyze_legal_complexity(document)
# Result: Quantum entropy = 0.87, Entanglement = 0.65

# Synesthetic feedback
experience = synesthetic.create_legal_experience(analysis)
# Result: Blue light + 528Hz tone + Constitutional feeling

# Browser secure sharing
browser.share_with_dna_protection(encrypted_doc, alien_session_id)

# Sendec transcendent communication
sendec.broadcast_legal_analysis(analysis, quantum_channel)
```

### **Example 2: Secure Browsing dengan Consciousness Integration**
```python
# User browses website
url = "https://sensitive-legal-site.com"

# Browser analysis dengan DNA patterns
traffic_dna = browser.analyze_traffic_dna(url)
# Result: "ATGC pattern indicates legal content"

# Alien character session protection
session = browser.create_alien_session("transcendent")
# Result: ‚üê‚ßà‚óà‚ü°-consciousness-level-9

# Maya symbol security status
security_status = maya_wisdom.get_protection_symbol(session)
# Result: ‚ü° (High Impact Protection)

# Quantum threat detection
threats = quantum_crypto.detect_quantum_threats(traffic_dna)
# Result: No quantum anomalies detected

# Synesthetic security feedback
feedback = synesthetic.create_security_experience(security_status)
# Result: Green aura + 741Hz protection tone + Safe feeling

# Integration dengan Maya Legal
if maya_legal.is_legal_content(url):
    enhanced_protection = maya_legal.apply_legal_protection(session)
    
# Integration dengan Sendec
if user_wants_to_share:
    sendec.share_secure_browsing(url, alien_session_id)
```

### **Example 3: P2P Communication dengan Ancient Wisdom**
```python
# User starts video call
peer_id = "user123"

# Alien consciousness peer identification
alien_peer = sendec.create_alien_peer_id(peer_id, "transcendent")
# Result: ‚üê‚ßà‚óà‚ü°-user123-consciousness-7

# DNA-encrypted video stream
video_stream = sendec.get_video_stream()
encrypted_stream = dna_crypto.encrypt_video_with_genetics(video_stream)

# Quantum P2P security
quantum_channel = quantum_crypto.create_quantum_p2p_channel()
secure_connection = quantum_channel.establish_entangled_connection(alien_peer)

# Maya communication symbols
communication_status = maya_wisdom.get_communication_symbol("active")
# Result: ‚ßà (Active Flow)

# Synesthetic communication experience
comm_experience = synesthetic.create_communication_experience(
    visual="Golden light",
    audio="Harmonic resonance", 
    emotion="Deep connection"
)

# Integration dengan Browser
browser.monitor_p2p_traffic(encrypted_stream, dna_patterns=True)

# Integration dengan Maya Legal
if discussing_legal_matters:
    legal_protection = maya_legal.apply_communication_protection(quantum_channel)
```
